```{r}
y <- c(8,11,2)
x <- c(3,5,1)
n <- length(x) ; n

xb <- mean(x) ; xb
yb <- mean(y) ; yb

(x-xb)
sxx <- sum((x-xb)^2) ; sxx
(y-yb)
(y-yb)*(x-xb)
sxy <- sum((y-yb)*(x-xb)) ; sxy

bh1 <- sxy/sxx ; bh1
bh0 <- yb-bh1*xb ; bh0

yh <- bh0 + bh1*x ; yh

e <- (y-yh) ; e
sum(e)
sse <- sum((y-yh)^2) ; sse

d <- data.frame(y=y,x=x) ; d

m <- lm(y~x,d) ; summary(m)

```
